text: Buru Tetaren Sanla26.17 Buru Tetaren Sanla: Yahudiyane yi burun donma lɛbɛn mi yi saxi naxan yi xii solofere sanli ito bun. E sariɲan kiina nde nan yi a ra. A mato Xɔrɔyaan 12.15 kui. sogen fɔlɔna, xarandiine yi fa Yesu fɛma, e yi a maxɔdin, e naxa, “I waxi a xɔn ma nxu xa Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla donseen nafala i xa minɛn?”
